content:
@Lloyd McKenzie - Tagging you to get some input. The headers on our pages are not correct. Most pages have a counter, but they are not correct. I did some investigation, and even tried changing some things in the framework directory, and I made some things better but others worse. I even tried syncing up our framework folder with the sdc IG framework folder in case something got out of sync. But no change.

I have to admit to not being a CSS expert. Any chance you could take a look?
